root.name: Air Raiders
root.description: Air Raiders was released by M Network, a subsidiary of Mattel Electronics that specialized in Atari 2600. It was programmed by Larry Zwick. It is one of the very few games released by the M Network that did not have an Intellivision counter-part. There are two label variations of Air Raiders: an original black label version from M Network, and a white label re-release from INTV Corp. This game was titled Air Battle in development, and at least one prototype cart has surfaced.
